Repeatable.title: Repeatable
Repeatable.description: Used to hold properties for types which can appear multiple times.

PersonNameType.title: PersonNameType
PersonNameType.description: A collection of data representing a person name.

AddressType.title: AddressType
AddressType.description: To specify the components of the delivery address for the vCard object.

label.description: Parameter to present a delivery address label for the address.

ext.description: The extended address (e.g. apartment or suite number).

IdentificationType.title: IdentificationType
IdentificationType.description: Used to capture information associated with the identification and naming of the entity associated with the vCard.

fn.description: To specify the formatted text corresponding to the name of the object the vCard represents.

n.description: To specify the components of the name of the object the vCard represents.

nickname.description: To specify the text corresponding to the nickname of the object the vCard represents.

photo.description: To specify an image or photograph information that annotates some aspect of the object the vCard represents.

bday.description: To specify the birth date of the object the vCard represents.

anniversary.description: The date of marriage, or equivalent, of the object the vCard represents.

gender.description: To specify the components of the sex and gender identity of the object the vCard represents.

OrganizationType.title: OrganizationType
OrganizationType.description: Information associated with characteristics of the organization or organizational units of the object that the vCard represents.

title.description: To specify the job title, functional position or function of the object the vCard represents.

role.description: To specify the function or part played in a particular situation by the object the vCard represents.

logo.description: To specify a graphic image of a logo associated with the object the vCard represents.

org.description: To specify the organizational name and units associated with the vCard.

member.description: To include a member in the group this vCard represents.

related.description: To specify a relationship between another entity and the entity represented by this vCard.

CommunicationType.title: CommunicationType
CommunicationType.description: Information about how to communicate with the object the vCard represents.

tel.description: To specify the telephone number for telephony communication with the object the jCard represents.

enumNames: Indicates that the telephone number supports text messages (SMS).
Indicates a cellular or mobile telephone number.
Indicates a video conferencing telephone number.
Indicates a paging device telephone number.
Indicates a telecommunication device for people with hearing or speech difficulties.

email.description: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object the vCard represents.

impp.description: To specify the URI for instant messaging and presence protocol communications with the object the vCard represents.

lang.description: To specify the language(s) that may be used for contacting the entity associated with the vCard.

CalendarType.title: CalendarType
CalendarType.description: A calendar entity, such as an event [RFC2739]

fburl.description: To specify the URI for a user's busy time in a vCard object.

caladruri.description: To specify the calendar user address [RFC5545] to which a scheduling request [RFC5546] should be sent for the object represented by the vCard.

caluri.description: To specify the URI for a calendar associated with the object represented by the vCard.

source.description: To identify the source of directory information contained in the content type.

kind.description: To specify the kind of object the vCard represents.

adr.description: To specify the components of the delivery address for the vCard object.

categories.description: To specify application category information about the vCard.

note.description: To specify supplemental information or a comment that is associated with the vCard.

prodid.description: To specify the identifier for the product that created the vCard object.

rev.description: To specify revision information about the current vCard.

sound.description: To specify a digital sound content information that annotates some aspect of the vCard. By default this property is used to specify the proper pronunciation of the name property value of the vCard.

uid.description: To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the individual or resource associated with the vCard.

clientpidmap.description: To give a global meaning to a local PID source identifier. A semicolon-separated pair of values. The first field is a small integer corresponding to the second field of a PID parameter instance. The second field is a URI.

url.description: To specify a uniform resource locator associated with the object that the vCard refers to.

version.description: To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the individual or resource associated with the vCard.

key.description: To specify a public key or authentication certificate associated with the object that the vCard represents.

geo.description: To specify information related to the global positioning of the object the vCard represents.

tz.description: To specify information related to the time zone of the object the vCard represents.
